title: Darker Side: Game Music & Loop Pack
description: A professional music soundtrack for games in the fantasy, ambient, sci-fi, survival, and thriller genres. Dark and brooding, pulsing tracks that raise the tension and drama aspect of your game!
longDescription:
The Darker Side Music & Loop Pack (Listen to a Sampler here: darker-side-sci-fiambient-music-loop-pack-for-game-developers_sampler contains over 30 minutes of music with 23 music files and seamless loops! Excellent for fantasy, ambient, survival, and sci-fi genres. Dark and brooding, pulsing tracks that raise the tension and drama aspect of your game! ALL ROYALTY-FREE AND READY TO PLACE IN YOUR PROJECT!


Darker Side contains a variety of loop lengths and styles, as well as a full mix for trailers and promotion of your project. Lots of dark percussive layers and brooding atmospheres to add to your game's audio experience!


My music and sound design can be heard in more than 1,110 television episodes airing daily in over 120 countries, 40 films, and more than 200 video games.Â 


Website: https://www.taris-studios.com
